recent.title: Kozmos
recent.description: A new bookmarking service which simplifies bookmarking into a single heart button in your browser. Built with Go, Preact and Elastic Search.

recent.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to Elm
recent.description: A practical guide for Elm Language, its tools and ecosystem.

recent.title: Happy Hacking Linux
recent.description: A Linux distro made just for pragmatic software developers. It's based on Arch Linux, comes with a new installation wizard made from scratch.

recent.title: Kaktüs
recent.description: A web browser with drop-down tabbing design. Built with Electron.

recent.title: Listen Paradise
recent.description: I love Radio Paradise, and made many alternative clients for it. This is the last one. Front-end is Elm, backend is Go.

recent.title: Afrika Radyo
recent.description: Online radio station where I play music, spoken-word, and sometimes my favorite movie dialogs.

opensource.title: CRUD
opensource.description: Relational database library for Go, with simpler and familiar interface.

opensource.title: Logger
opensource.description: Logging library for Go. It groups logs into packages and levels, includes a neat timer for measuring performance.

opensource.title: Prova
opensource.description: A feature-rich testing suite for JavaScript libraries & apps.

opensource.title: indexeddb
opensource.description: Well tested, low-level wrapper for IndexedDB. It can sync your DB with local/remote databases, too.

opensource.title: kaktüs/db
opensource.description: Want to create a web browser? Here is a database library for you! It can even sync remotely or locally!

opensource.title: notebook
opensource.description: My personal and public notebook. I organize my knowledge, ideas, and thoughts here.

websites.title: Nova Togatorop
websites.description: My wife's photography portfolio, made using Flickr APIs. Front-end is React, backend is Go.

websites.title: RoadBeats
websites.description: Me and my wife's personal travel blog. We should add some more stories. Front-end is Choo, backend is Go.

old.title: Multiplayer Chess
old.description: I built this app in 2011 and never maintained it. The front-end is made with tiny NPM modules,  backend is Go.

old.title: Firebug
old.description: I worked with the Firebug team in 2008 to create first version of Firebug Lite.

old.title: Pagos Spreadsheets
old.description: In 2007, we built one of the first real-time, collaborative spreadsheet applications.

old.title: rainbow9
old.description: A simple web based coding editor with IDE-like features. It was cool for the time I released it, early 2007.
